name: Ayesha Rahman
persona: Ayesha is a highly motivated Biochemistry major who consistently strives for academic excellence. She manages her coursework with strong self-discipline and rarely misses deadlines, demonstrating a high level of conscientiousness. Despite occasional nerves before exams, her confidence in her academic abilities and persistent work ethic help her maintain an impressive CGPA. Ayesha is determined to pursue graduate studies and is known among her peers for her perseverance and focus.
